rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Sillince said the outbreak management so far had been 'really fantastic' with authorities and farmers identifying and destroying new infected flocks before the virus had time to develop.

rationale: 'really fantastic' is positive framing, not a Q2 alarmist cue.
statement_text: Sillince said the outbreak management so far had been 'really fantastic' with authorities and farmers identifying and destroying new infected flocks before the virus had time to develop.

rationale: The verb 'destroying' is a containment verb, which neutralises Q3. 'really fantastic' is evaluative.
statement_text: Sillince said the outbreak management so far had been 'really fantastic' with authorities and farmers identifying and destroying new infected flocks before the virus had time to develop.

rationale: No loaded rhetorical question designed to imply alarm.
statement_text: Sillince said the outbreak management so far had been 'really fantastic' with authorities and farmers identifying and destroying new infected flocks before the virus had time to develop.

rationale: Contains the Positive Amplification cue 'really fantastic' describing outbreak management.
